name: SUPER POA
description:
A game based on a thesis about vegetation under control in a marshalling yard.

THESIS

Issu :

How to exterminate invasive growth close to the service tracks and theirs pathways without herbicide. 

A solution :

Seed rather than fight : etablish a selected vegetation on service tracks and theirs pathways

GAME

Type: 

Third person shooting

Goal :

Seed all the map.

You have to shoot on the enemy and on the floor to plant your seed and advance to the goal. 

INPUT

shoot : A 

teleportation : E

shoot range  :  S 

aim rotation :  Q and D

           -

TEAM and ROLES

EHMIG MURIEL : PhD,  texturing artist

LUONG EMILIE : Game designer, Level designer

PINHOT ANGELOT : 3D artist

VATAIRE TEDDY : Developer

ARTIGUES THIBAUD & LOQUET ACHILLE: Sound designer
